message:
i think that Apple Watch will be a huge success despite inheriting the same Apple products syndrome! (high price tag), but iPhone 6 is actually no big deal except being a copy of Koreans Sam or LG.

BTW Apple proves every day that its identity built from two things which they done brilliantly, Industrial Design + Marketing.

data.message: They will always succeed as long there are people insecure and desperate enough to buy their products so they can feel "special"
I think it's a backward step. People are abandoning watches for phones and Apple is reviving something from the past!!
